original_text:
Those who were full have hired themselves out for bread,
    but those who were hungry have ceased to hunger.
The barren has borne seven,
    but she who has many children is forlorn.
korean_text: 풍족하던 자들은 양식을 위하여 품을 팔고 주리던 자들은 다시 주리지 아니하도다 전에 임신하지 못하던 자는 일곱을 낳았고 많은 자녀를 둔 자는 쇠약하도다

sentences.original_text: Those who were full have hired themselves out for bread
sentences.korean_translation: 배부르던 자들은 빵을 얻으려고 품을 팔았다.

sentences.original_text: but those who were hungry have ceased to hunger
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 굶주리던 자들은 더 이상 굶주리지 않는다.
아이가 없던 여자는 일곱 아이를 낳았다.

sentences.original_text: but she who has many children is forlorn
